title: Transfering servers
body: Hi, I'm on the Alpha Client and I would like to transfer an account from EUW to OCE can anyone help? I Cant find where it says to transfer within the client. Tanks

replies.body:
Account transfers haven't made it to the new client just yet, but if you launch into the Legacy Client at the login screen (shown below) you can transfer from there.

(Click to enlarge)

https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/article_attachments/215576628/Launch-Legacy-Client.jpg

Let me know if this helped.
That's helped so much, thank youuu
